revised_title: Surface State and Band Structure of Tungsten {110} Surface: Photoemission Study
tldr: The authors investigated the electronic structure of the {110} surface of tungsten using angle-resolved photoemission. They discovered a surface state with m = 1 d-orbital character and examined its dispersion throughout the surface Brillouin zone. The study also explored the applicability of the tight-binding approximation to the understanding of the electronic structure of metal surfaces.
